Text.val: If there was an error, create an error message
This would normally be added to a log or shown to the user
The translation can be a global function, because standard messages are used for the XML Functions.
Convert the file to a blob, since the tester is working with blob
Move it back to disk, so the changes are saved
This allows you to edit the raw XML, to induce changes and errors for testiong.

ExpSyntax.val: 'XM16: How Do I Retrieve / Update /Insert Data According to a Certain Path in an XML Document?'
'Inserted element or attribute alias is not defined'
'I/O file not opened in Write mode'

Text.val: Note that this element is illegal according to the schema, but in this kind of
access, the schema is not consulted.
